name: Mister Lopez
descriptions: Mister Lopez is a suicidal resident of Rivet City in the year 2277.

Mister Lopez is a quiet, lonely and severely depressed 65-year-old man. Raiders took the lives of his wife and child, and he came to Rivet City alone and lost. For the past decade, he has been living in the common room of Rivet City. He consumes his meals in the common room and often sleeps for long periods out of sheer depression. He has a daily habit of climbing to the top of the bridge tower and contemplating whether to end his life by jumping.

He regularly visits Saint Monica's Church and spends much of his time reading or praying there. Lopez also attends the weekly church service and receives frequent counseling from Father Clifford, the church priest.

topics.response_text: Haven't run into you before. You probably wouldn't remember me anyway. I'm Mister Lopez.

topics.topic_text: Could I ask you about Rivet City's history?
topics.response_text: Why bother? There's never anything good in the past.

topics.topic_text: Where can I find Ted Strayer?
topics.response_text: Have you tried the common room?  That's where he sleeps.

topics.topic_text: Suicide is a sin. Kill yourself, and your soul won't go to Heaven.
topics.response_text: That's what Father Clifford says. I'm not sure I believe that. I'll think about it.

topics.topic_text: Couldn't save your family, can't kill yourself... You're fucking pathetic.
topics.response_text: You're right. I've failed everyone. Even my family.

topics.topic_text: Um... yeah. Well, look at the time. I have to go now...

topics.response_text: Is it that obvious? I suppose so.

topics.topic_text: If that's what you really want, I'll help you.
topics.response_text: Thank you. A quick shove should do it.

topics.topic_text: What about Ted? He needs guidance. A father figure.
topics.response_text: Ted Strayer? I suppose I could talk to him. He is kind of a lost boy.
Nobody does. I'm not very memorable.

topics.topic_text: Real courage is living. Only cowards commit suicide.
topics.response_text: You may be right, but I have nothing to live for.

topics.topic_text: Have you seen C.J. Young lately?
topics.response_text: I thought I saw them running over the bridge.
